narratives.question_text: What was valuable about the format and content of this class?
comments: I love the variety of speakers Wendall brings in. Very interesting.
Very vivid and every class has different topic and guest speaker.
The guest lecturers were interesting at times.
Excellent class. Open minded and speaker are all amazing!
I enjoyed hearing so many different experts talk about their field.
The topics that this class has covered were so broad and the content of each topics was enjoyable.
great content and format in the class, I like that each time we can learn something new from different lecturers. the topics are wide and covered different areas, which is great.
The invitiation of other artists to come speak.
That we got to learn so many different topics from experts in a small period of time
I enjoyed being exposed to all sorts of different information - I wish I had been able to take the fall term class too.
The classes that we are given a heads up on who is speaking allows for a little googling in advance. It's nice to be able to ask informed questions when the opportunity is given.
More interaction with students and give more background of topic before the class so those students who are not familiar with the topic, especially international students, could catch up.
Some sort of structure would be nice and sometimes the guest lecturers were not very engaging or did not have much interesting to offer in regards to the field of visual storytelling.
arrange the order of each lecture based on the content and group the lectures

narratives.question_text: Please provide any other constructive comments.
comments: I loved this class because now i know so many new things that I would have never studies otherwise
I wish there was a larger space - maybe where we take drama 6?
